revised_title: In Memoriam: Celebrating the Lives and Contributions of Distinguished Scientists
tldr: This article is an obituary for several distinguished scientists who passed away in 1926, including John Gray McKendrick, William Bateson, Heike Kamerlingh Onnes, Arthur Robertson Cushny, Sir Philip Watts, William James Lewis, Henry Brougham Guppy, William Boog Leishman, Frederick Walker Mott, and Thomas Roscoe Rede Stebbing. The article highlights their significant contributions to various fields of science, such as physiology, genetics, cryogenics, and pathology.
